name: Five Nights at Dex Rock's
description:
This game is a parody of FNAF.

I have made this game in February 2022 and forgot to release it.

Characters in this game are inspired by Dex Rock, a popular Serbian youtuber who makes content for kids.

Unfortunately I was still learning game development back then so the game looks bad, and it's AI characters have the most basic calculations. Source code has been lost so I can't make any changes.

Anyways I hope you enjoy playing it.

There are easter eggs in the game too...

!!THERE IS COPYRIGHTED MUSIC IN GAME. IF YOU ARE AUTHOR OF ANY OF THESE SONGS OR YOU HAVE SOME OTHER COMPLAINTS YOU CAN CONTACT ME AT vuplaxd@gmail.com!!
